# HTTP client
requests>=2.28.0

git+https://github.com/requests/toolbelt.git@main#egg=requests-toolbelt

django^4.2.0

# Package with hash (will be stripped with warning)

# Index URL (will generate comment)
--index-url https://pypi.org/simple

pywin32>=306 ; platform_system == 'Windows'
